parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter condition for the query. If not provided, all consumer groups under the specified instance will be queried.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Specifies which instance's consumer group list to retrieve.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, indicating which page of results to return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Page size, the maximum number of results to display per page.

Value range: [10, 100].
